result.title: Extensive life cycle assessment, life cycle costing and social LCA of pilots and self-assessment tool
result.description: The assessment of pilots according to their performances and impacts, integrating environmental, economic, and social indicators will be used to provide an insight on current trade-offs and/or win-win situations, presented in a report on which the self-assessment tool for the evaluation of sustainability of CRFS is built.
